title: Back for More
description: LGBT Multicultural ParanormalSteve has wanted Alex since they were best friends in high school, but Alex always held back. Almost ten years since graduation, Steve finally has his sex addiction under control and his life on track. He's figured it all out, except why he was a sex addict at all. So he turns to his trusted friend, Alex, for answers.Alex may be a past life regression and hypnotic therapist but he'd always known he and Steve shared a lot of past life history from his psychic abilities. As they explore and heal those past lives and meet those kinky other selves that lost their happiness too young, the men are falling hard for each other. Can this life be the one where they're finally lucky in love?Publisher's This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find Anal play/intercourse, male/male sexual practices, violence.
author: Cheryl Dragon
